summary: Olivia Wilde is now a Skyrim citizen, brought to you by the same awesome guy and my good friend Omega99jp (After I nagged him a lot xD) who also brought Angelina Jolie and Jessica Alba to Skyrim..
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][color=yellow]***FULL CREDIT GOES TO [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5568493]Omega99jp[/url] for bringing Olivia Wilde into skyrim***[/b][/size][/color]

Check out the other work of Omega99jp
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27955]Lovely Jessica - Standalone by Omega99jp[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26112]AngeLydia -Lydia is reborn by Omega99jp[/url]
And Angelina\'s standalone version by me [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26437]Angelina Jolie - Standalone Follower[/url]


[b][size=3pt][color=red]If you want Olivia as a Replacer for the Riften Housecarl, check my other mod[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35521]Olivia Wilde - Housecarl Replacer[/url][/size]
[color=cyan] [u](You can either use the standalone version or the replacer, NOT both)[/color][/u][/b]


[b]#### My other mods ####[/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34273]Namaofs Watchtower - A Player Home[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31375]Hearthfire Alternative Library[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29635]Olivia Wilde - Nude Patches[/url] ADULT[/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26437]Angelina Jolie - Standalone Follower[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26611]Angelina Jolie - Nude Patches[/url] ADULT[/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24684]UNP Clothing Merchants[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24894]Severus Jewelry Collection Merchant[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24559]SED7 Accessories and Piercings Merchant[/url] ADULT[/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24421]Adult Toys Merchant - NSFW[/url] ADULT[/size][/b]


[b][size=2][color=yellow]###### Brief description ######[/size][/color][/b]
[b]This mod brings Olivia Wilde (a very beautiful and talented actress, known for the famous tv show House MD and movies like Tron and Alpha Dog) to Skyrim as a standalone follower, she was made by Omega99jp who also brought Angelina Jolie and Jessica Alba to Skyrim.

Olivia is an assassin (uses daggers and bows), I gave her low to medium perks related to her class, she can also heal herself a little bit when she is near death, she can be married.

You can find Olivia in the Frost Fruit Inn in Rorikstead, she will go back there if you dismiss her.[/b]


[b][size=2][color=yellow]###### HOW TO INSTALL ######[/b][/size][/color]
[b][size=4][color=yellow] REQUIRES SKYRIM v1.8.151.0 [/color][/size][/b]
1- Download and install ONLY 1 of the main files, either the CBBE Curvy, the CBBE Slim or the UNP version, you can not use both versions at the same time.
2- Activate OliviaWilde.esp in your mod manager or game launcher and play the game

[b]I made a nude patch for the CBBE Curvy and CBBE slim and UNP v1.0 (works with v1.1), you will find a BBP nude patch and a regular nude patch, pick whichever you want that matches the body you picked, you can grab it from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29635]Olivia Wilde - Nude Patches[/url] ADULT[/b]


[b][size=2][color=yellow]###### Optional Files ######[/b][/size][/color]
Currently there are no optional files, I may or may not make apachii hair patches for Olivia, I may however make a little tutorial on how to do it later..

There is an apachii hair patch for the UNP version v1.0 of Olivia made by Gambit77
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29667]Olivia Wilde patches[/url]


[b][size=2][color=yellow]##### How to Uninstall #####[/b][/size][/color]
1- Take any items you have given Olivia then dismiss her
2- Save and close the game
3- Delete the mod or uninstall using NMM 

If you want to do it manually, Delete the following>>

Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\[color=cyan]OliviaWilde[/color] < delete this folder
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\[color=cyan]OliviaWilde.esp[/color] < delete this folder
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\[color=cyan]OliviaWilde[/color] < delete this folder
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facetint\\[color=cyan]OliviaWilde.esp[/color] < delete this folder
Data\\[color=cyan]OliviaWilde.esp[/color]< delete this file
4- Done


[b][color=red]#### FAQ ####[/color][/b]
NA


[b][color=yellow]#### CREDIT ####[/color][/b]
Omega99jp
Dimon99 for his amazing UNP body [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP female body (Contains ADULT content)[/url]
Caliente for her amazing CBBE body [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/]CBBE Big Bottom Edition (Contains ADULT content)[/url]
